reviewer_info: Posted by Ali Nawab on Nov 07, 2019
review_text: Its a mini van 7 seater attractive look... Pre installed fog lamps good built quality decent hight and lenght & wheel base better than other compatitors, in interior it has dual ac (fornt & rear). It is very spacious vahicle head room and leg room is very specious... Electric power streering fornt driver & passenger power windows....
